# Generated by iptables-save v1.8.4 on Sat Oct 24 21:58:00 2020
*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [1381:400288]
:FORWARD ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [2029:150342]
-A INPUT -s 172.17.7.1/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.7.1/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.7.3/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j REJECT --reject-with icmp-port-unreachable
-A INPUT -s 192.168.7.4/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j REJECT --reject-with icmp-port-unreachable
-A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j DROP
-A FORWARD -s 192.168.7.0/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
COMMIT
# Completed on Sat Oct 24 21:58:00 2020
